text: Julie Ricevuto, Digital Beauty Editor | June 15, 2018 Jada Pinkett Smith tends to be rather honest with her fans when it comes to beauty. Case in point : her recent candidness regarding hair loss. Knowing this, we ’ ve kept an eye out for any other beauty admissions the 46 - year - old might reveal, and unsurprisingly, she delivered.
